items.sentence: Even Tom wouldn\'t be stupid enough to do that.
Tom insulted Mary. That\'s why she\'s so upset.
How many times have you played tennis with Tom?
Tom saw something in the woods that scared him.
That\'s something that we\'ll never understand.
That\'s the ugliest dress that I\'ve ever seen.
Are you going to take the entrance examination?
Are you still planning on going back to Boston?
Are you sure this is what Tom wanted us to buy?
Students were throwing snowballs at each other.
